title: Sayonara Futaribocchi Renai Shinsho
original_name: さよならふたりぼっち恋愛新書
sinopse:
In our usual group of college buddies, we have Shun-chan and Yuuta. From that flashy bunch of guys, Shun-chan is constantly finding every possible way to sexually harass the hardworking Yuuta. Then one day he actually confesses seriously, and so begins their clumsy dating experience.

(Source: MU)
